- Reconciliation of the payment against the Invoice

title: Consider against_voucher_no when voucher_no is filtered
body:
**Issue:**
General Ledger does not consider the against voucher type and against voucher when there isn't any grouping
**ref:** [26554](https://support.frappe.io/helpdesk/tickets/26554)

**Solution:**
When there isn't any grouping and the voucher is filtered `Group by Voucher (Consolidated)` is set to `filters.group_by`, so the against_voucher_no is not taken into consideration.
I removed the `Group by Voucher (Consolidated)` assignment and ignored the opening and closing of the voucher

title: feat: introduced new account for asset purchase process
body:
**This update introduces a temporary `Clearing Account` to manage expenses until an asset is operational.**
1. Purchase Receipt accounting entry: 
    * Clearing Account → Asset Received But Not Billed
2. Purchase Invoice accounting entry (Direct):
    * Creditors → Clearing Account
3. Asset submission accounting entry:
    * Clearing Account → Asset Account
4. Clearing Account Source:
    * Fetched from the Asset Category or the Company’s default clearing account.
5. Capital Work in Progress (CWIP) Validation
    * Disabling "Enable Capital Work in Progress" is only allowed if the CWIP account is balanced.

Should be done:
- [ ] Update docs
